metadata.name: Sky’s the Limit
metadata.description: ‘Sky’s a Limit’ is a unique piece based on the actual painting (oil on canvas) ‘Love: an unfolding narrative’ of the artist Just Alex. Freddy is a character of the Dutch brand The New Originals, who has a symbolic meaning and represents each of us. No matter how bad the storm may be, there always comes a rainbow. And after an end there is always a new beginning.
